title: Starting the game, adding
description: The player (North or South) pick a seed from his/her serves and add it to non-empty inner-row on his/her side
exceptions: Player cannot add seed to an empty pit
Seed cannot be added into on the back-row, only inner-row
Seed cannot be added into on the back-row, only inner-row
Player cannot add a seed into the House(functional) if that move cannot capture make a capture and there are other non-empty pits on the inner-row

title: Starting the game, sowing
description: After adding a seed from serve, (if no capture) a player takes all the seeds from the pit (+ added seed) and start sowing the seeds on either Clockwise or Anti-Clockwise direction

title: Starting the game, sowing continue
description: During sowing if the last seed ends in a empty pit, that is the end of a player move

title: Starting the game, sowing continue
description: During sowing if the last seed ends in a non-empty pit and cannot make a capture, sowing continue from that pit (take all pit seeds + last seed) in the same direction

title: Starting the game, sowing continue
description: During sowing if the last seed ends in a non-empty inner-row pit and can make a capture, the capture occurs
